content:
really great to see these awards/ funding where "ivory tower" meets "in the trenches" so to speak. however there are two links at the bottom of that NSF page about funding/ awards that currently both lead to 0 search results. no money awarded yet? that seems to be the case.
also a great case of empirical TCS research... hope to see this field/ research program/ style continue to grow.
author: vz nuri
